title: Anyone on board a member of VCP.com willing to look up a card value?
author: Howe’s Hunter

posts.post_title: Anyone on board a member of VCP.com willing to look up a card value?
posts.post_content: Guess I've heard of this service, but trying to find a relative value for a card, but have no clue. Don't want to low-ball my estimate, nor do I want to offer a lot more than it might actually be worth. Please email me at [url]edmccollum@cox.net[/url] if you might be willing to look up a value for me. Thanks.
You can join the service for $3.99 for one day.  I have found this to be a wonderful way to look up the value of cards when you don't buy or sell very often.

Posts like these remind me of the time I was out at a restaurant offering an all-you-can-eat crab option, and a guy at a table of six asked the waitress if they could just get one order and share it . . .
just google whatever issue and/or grade you are looking for a value. It will pull up far more and more recent sales than VCP.

posts.post_title: Thanks to several board members who have contacted me
posts.post_content: Think I have the info I'll need to make a reasonable offer. Thanks to Matt, Mark, Karthik, Marty and Steve.
